TextAsset.value: (I think this is where Terezi wanted me to meet her…
I keep walking and walking, though, and I haven’t seen anyone yet.
Except for these weird… plush toys?
Someone seems to have arranged them on the ground…
They look like small … lizards? Or dragons or something…
And they’re all different bright colors, with beady button eyes.
They look almost like they’re… staring at me…
Haha, that’s silly. They’re just toys!
Right…?!
They’re arranged in rows… almost like a…)
H3LLO TH3R3 COTTON C4NDY <3
1 S33 YOU’V3 NOT1C3D TH3 JURY FOR YOUR TR14L TOD4Y
1’V3 S3L3CT3D 4 NUMB3R OF 1MP4RT14L SC4L3M4T3 JURORS
W3 W4NT TO K33P TH1NGS F41R, 4FT3R 4LL >:]
“S-scalemates”? Is that what those things are called?
What are they, iguanas or something?!
DON’T YOU KNOW TH3 NOBL3 V1S4G3 OF 4 DR4GON WH3N YOU S33 ON3?!
I… I guess not…
But what did you mean by… “trial”?
Y3S Y3S, YOUR TR14L
W3 W3R3 WORR13D YOU’D TRY TO SK1P YOUR COURT D4T3, COTTON C4NDY
TH3N W3’D H4V3 TO PUT OUT 4 W4RR4NT FOR YOUR 4RR3ST WH1CH WOULD B3 NO FUN 4T 4LL… >:P
“Court date”???
I have no idea what’s going on.
I was kinda hoping this would be a regular date...
H3H3H3!
DON’T TRY TO SW33T T4LK TH3 PROS3CUTOR, COTTON C4NDY
YOU M4Y B3 3XC3PT1ON4LLY 4DOR4BL3…
(Gulp!!)
BUT TH4T WON’T S4V3 YOU 1N MY COURTROOM
(Aww.)
MY BLOOD T4ST3S L1K3 1C3 COLD BLU3 R4SPB3RRY SLUSH13
WH1CH 1S F1TT1NG B3C4US3, MUCH L1K3 MY BLOOD…
1 4M 4LSO 1C3 COLD!!!
(How does she know what her own blood tastes like?
You know what… I don’t want to even think about it.)
4R3 YOU R34DY TO B3G1N TH3 TR14L?!
I don’t even know what the trial is for!
4H4! COTTON C4NDY 4DM1TS TO NOT 3V3N KNOW1NG WH4T TH3 TR14L 1S FOR!
4 M4N1C GR1N SL1D3S 4CROSS TH3 PROS3CUTOR’S F4C3
H3R PR3Y 1S 4LR34DY SO CLOS3 SH3 C4N T4ST3 1T
ON3 MOR3 F4LS3 MOV3 4ND TH1S C4S3 W1LL B3 4LL WR4PP3D UP
TH3 JURORS 4R3 ON TH3 3DG3 OF TH31R S34TS, V1BR4T1NG W1TH TH3 3XC1T3M3NT OF 4 P4CK OF HUNGRY WOLV3S!
Wh-what is this?! Why are you narrating what’s happening in third person?!
F1RST QU3ST1ON!
WH3R3 W3R3 YOU ON TH3 N1GHT OF TH3 G14NT R41NBOW DONUT TR34T 1NC1D3NT?!
(Rainbow Donut Treat is what she calls my katamari, right??)
Uh… I guess I was rolling my katamari through the school?
Remember?! I’m pretty sure you were there…
4-H4! 4NOTH3R 4DM1SS1ON OF GU1LT!
TH3 D3F3ND4NT 1S SH4K1NG L1K3 4 L34F
TH3 SM3LL OF T3RR1F13D W4T3RM3LON-FL4VOR BUBBL3GUM W4FTS THROUGH TH3 COLD N1GHT 41R…
(I am NOT shaking like a leaf!)
YOU’R3 NOT YOURS3LF TOD4Y COTTON C4NDY
SOM3TH1NG ON YOUR M1ND P3RH4PS?
SOM3 SOURC3 OF GU1LT W31GH1NG OPPR3SS1V3LY ON YOUR SOUL?!
B-but you already knew I rolled the school up with my katamari that day!
I-I think you even wanted me to do it again?
You keep suggesting I break it out of the weapons locker…
Why am I on trial for this?
WHAT’S GOING ON?!
S1L3NC3 COTTON C4NDY!!!
L4ST QU3ST1ON…
DO YOU R3COGN1Z3… TH1S P3RSON?!
(She’s shoving a photograph in my face…)
It looks like… another one of those Scalemate plush things…
You know, exactly like all the other ones you have arranged here.
OH Y34H
SORRY 4BOUT TH4T
TH1S 1S 4 BL4CK 4ND WH1T3 PHOTOGR4PH, SO YOU C4N’T R34LLY T3LL WH1CH ON3 1T 1S
SN1111FFFFFF!
(Wha?! She shoved the photo into her face to smell it?!)
4HH 1 LOV3 TH3 SM3LL OF GR4Y…
L1K3 TH3 T4ST3 OF R41N ON TH3 41R ON 4 W4RM CLOUDY N1GHT…
OR OF TH3 4SH3S OF 4 D3STROY3D 3N3MY! >:]
Oh… Kay…
So why are you showing me a photo of a Scalemate again?
1F TH1S PHOTO W3R3 1N COLOR YOU WOULD S33 TH4T TH1S P4RT1CUL4R SC4L3M4T3…
H4S BUTTON 3Y3S TH3 D3L1C1OUS COLOR OF CH3RRY R3D…
4ND WH1T3 FL3SH L1K3 CR1SP V4N1LL4 1C3 CR34M
4S YOU C4N PROB4BLY T3LL H3 W4S TH3 MOST D3L1C1OUS SC4L3M4T3 3V3R!
4ND H3 W4S 4LSO TH3 MOST LOY4L, TH3 MOST LOV1NG…
TH3 B3ST P4RTN3R 4 TROLL COULD 3V3R H4V3
R1NG 4NY B3LLS Y3T COTTON C4NDY?!
Um…
No?
TH1S SC4L3M4T3…
W4S MY OLD P4RTN3R…
PYR4LSP1T3!
H3 W4S BY MY S1D3 FOR M4NY SW33PS…
BUT WH3N 4 C3RT41N 1NC1D3NT B3F3LL N4MCO H1GH
H3 D1S4PP34R3D!
1 KNOW MY PYR4LSP1T3 WOULD N3V3R L34V3 M3
WH3N YOU’V3 B33N P4RTN3RS FOR TH4T LONG, TH3 BOND DO3SN’T D1SSOLV3 SO 34S1LY!
BUT S1NC3 H3 D1S4PP34R3D ON TH3 D4Y OF YOUR R41NBOW DONUT TR34T 1NC1D3NT…
W3LL YOU PUT TH3 P13C3S TOG3TH3R COTTON C4NDY!
What?!
THAT’S who your old partner was?!
Just another dumb toy? Of which you obviously still have many?!
I thought he was like, an ex-boyfriend or something.
H3H3H3!
TH3 LOV3 PYR4LSP1T3 4ND 1 SH4R3D W3NT F4R D33P3R TH4N 4NY OF TH3 FOUR QU4DR4NTS...
(Quadrants?!
No, I think my policy of not asking about troll stuff has served me pretty well thus far.)
GOT 4NYTH1NG TO S4Y FOR YOURS3LF, COTTON C4NDY?!
TH3 CLOCK 1S T1CK1NG!
I don’t even know what you’re talking about!
I had no idea about Pyralspite before, so how can I know what happened to him?!
Listen to me. “Him”. It’s a stuffed animal for pete’s sake!
YOU SHUT YOUR MOUTH 4BOUT PYR4LSP1T3 OR 1 W1LL HOLD YOU 1N CONT3MPT!!!
How can that be any worse than what you’re already doing to me?!
1 DON’T 3V3N N33D TO FL1P MY CO1N FOR TH1S ON3
TH3 JURORS 4GR33-
YOU’R3 GU1LTY, COTTON C4NDY
B3YOND 4 SH4DOW OF 4 DOUBT!
GU1LTY!
Guilty of WHAT?!
H3H3H3!
WOULDN’T YOU L1K3 TO KNOW?
YES!!!
TOO L4T3 COTTON C4NDY
TH3 G4V3L H4S COM3 DOWN!
(Omigosh… she brought out a length of rope…
IS SHE GOING TO HANG ME LIKE IN THE MOVIES?!
No wait, she’s just tying it around my waist…
It looks like she’s just tying me to one of these trees, so I can’t move.
That’s not as bad as hanging.
...Wait a minute!
It’s still bad though!!!)
YOUR S3NT3NC3 H4S B33N D3L1V3R3D
N1C3 TRY, COTTON C4NDY…
BUT YOU C4N N3V3R 3SC4P3 TH3 LONG 4RM OF TH3 L4W!
W-wait a minute! Terezi! You’re not gonna just leave me here are you?!
S33 YOU L4T3R COTTON C4NDY!
WHAT?! What did I even do?!
What IS this?!
You’re crazy!
(Wait a minute… she’s way too young to have passed the bar already.
There’s no way she could be a certified lawyer!
This trial was a farce!)
TEREZI!!!
${slot:playerName}? Where are you?
Oh thank goodness! Someone finally found me!
What are you doing, tying yourself to a tree?!
Trying to get out of detention, eh?
Well, you also missed a few of your classes, too!
That calls for DOUBLE DETENTION!
How could I have tied myself to a tree?
Obviously I didn’t mean for this to happen…
Isn’t being left out here for hours punishment enough?
Hmm… Good point.
But, no.
(...Terezi, you planned this didn’t you!
You’re either a mastermind…
Or totally insane.)
